ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Bard Crowd Control
ygData.msgSnippet: i don t think crowd control or dealing without lullaby is the issue for most.  we have all dealt without lullaby for a year.  it s the way bards are being
ygData.messageBody:
i don't think crowd control or dealing without lullaby is the issue for
most. we have all dealt without lullaby for a year. it's the way bards are
being treated by verant. as i think kitasi said, i would never have
expected to see lyrnia go as she was an avid supporter of verant decisions
(nothing wrong with that, just saying). the way they make decisions about
bards is what i think people can no longer stomach.

Shada

> Since I have given up ever getting mez again, I have moved on with
> (Dark)Elfson Allegro. My guild has fallen in love with City
> of Mist this
> week (after past affairs with Dalinars and Kaesora).
